title: PAI Celebrates the Life of Dr. Nafis Sadik, Champion of Women’s Reproductive Health and Rights - PAI

quotes: Dr. Sadik’s signature diplomatic achievement was forging a consensus among 179 U.N. member states at the 1994 International Conference on Population and Development (ICPD) in Cairo
Nearly three decades later, it remains our roadmap to achieve a world of reproductive rights and choices for all.

time_markers.text: As the 30th anniversary of ICPD approaches
quotes: As the 30th anniversary of ICPD approaches, we look forward to building upon the progress that has been achieved since 1994.
